caption: Agent Locator
description: Locators provide actual artifact locators of an agent. For example, this can reference sources such as helm charts, docker images, binaries, etc.
name: locator

name.description: The schema extension name. For example: dev.

annotations.caption: Annotations
annotations.description: Additional metadata associated with the extension.

type.caption: Type
type.description: Describes the type of the release manifest pointed by its URI, e.g. oci-image, docker-image, py-package, binary. Allowed values MAY be defined for common manifest types.

url.caption: URL
url.description: Specifies an URI from which this object MAY be downloaded. Value MUST conform to RFC 3986. Value SHOULD use the http and https schemes, as defined in RFC 7230.

size.caption: Size
size.description: Specifies the size of the release manifest in bytes.

digest.caption: Digest
digest.description: Specifies the digest of the release manifest contents.
